context.p: Customers can explicitly start and stop servers and suspend and resume instances in OpenStack from . To do this, they execute the appropriate service operation from the subscription for the virtual system:

ul.li: Start: Starts all servers in the OpenStack instance that were stopped.
Stop: Stops all servers in the OpenStack instance that were started.
Resume: Resumes the OpenStack instance if it was suspended.

context.p: As a prerequisite, the service operations must be defined in the technical service underlying the subscribed service.
Customers can view the status of all operations they started in their account information on the marketplace.
